name: Apiary
description:
Apiary is a Hyper Casual mobile game where you must consume flowers as a beehive. To do that, you shoot bees towards them. When the bees fly, they FEEL the smell of flowers and a strong FEELING of attraction pulls them towards them, changing their course. Try and consume as many flowers as possible before they reach your hive and clog it up.

CONTROLS:

Click and Drag to shoot (anywhere on the screen)

CREDITS:

Elf Meditation Preview by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5728-elf-meditation-preview
